text.wc.title: WaveyCapes Settings
text.wc.setting.capestyle.tooltip: Switch between a smoothly bending and blocky cape.
text.wc.setting.windmode.tooltip: Add extra movement to the cape.
text.wc.setting.capemovement.tooltip: Change the way the cape behaves.
text.wc.setting.gravity.tooltip: Change the amount of gravity applied to the cape.
text.wc.setting.heightMultiplier.tooltip: Change how extreme the cape reacts to Y movement.
